abstract_summ: A new model has been proposed and calibrated for interpreting the transmission dynamics of the novel coronavirus disease (COVID-19) The study is to give a tentative prediction of the epidemic peak for Russia, Brazil, India and Bangladesh . The recovery rate of undetected asymptomatic carriers and the transition rate from quarantined class to susceptible class are the most influential parameters . Relaxing social distancing restrictions too quickly could exacerbate the epidemic outbreak .
